main event: A metallic object was observed at high altitude over Bolling Air Force Base, exhibiting rapid, erratic movement.
interesting points: The object appeared to be metallic in nature and was observed for 2 to 3 minutes.
The object exhibited rapid, erratic movement at high altitude.
There were multiple observers, including a civilian and military personnel.
A separate incident involved a large, black, silent aircraft that was hovering at an estimated altitude of 500 feet before departing at high speed.
Another incident involved a spherical, white illuminated object approximately 30 feet in diameter that was observed for 20-25 minutes.
sighted object: metallic object, large black aircraft, spherical white object
location: Bolling Air Force Base, Washington, D.C.
